trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Contiene información sobre una parte de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> en una coordenada especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> se utiliza junto con el método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> para determinar en qué parte de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> ha hecho clic el usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class contains the location and associated designer that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contiene la ubicación y el diseñador asociado en los que se ha hecho clic.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> asociado.

trans-unit.source: The location on the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: La ubicación en la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> asociada en la que se ha hecho clic.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> asociado a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> asociada a la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property stores a reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> almacena una referencia al objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> asociado al objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to reference extended information about the designer associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> para hacer referencia a la información extendida sobre el diseñador asociado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve los límites del área acertada.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object or an empty rectangle if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object is not associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: Un rectángulo que agrega <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> asociado al objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> o un rectángulo vacío si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> no está asociado a un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The bounds will describe the area on the screen that was hit, usually the area that encloses the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Los límites describirán el área en la pantalla que se ha alcanzado, normalmente el área que comprende el <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>asociado.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about where the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Contiene información sobre donde se produjo el acierto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> that describes the area hit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> que describe el área acertada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> to determine on what area of the designer the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> para determinar en qué área del diseñador se produjo el acierto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the hit designer.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el índice del diseñador de acierto.

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer hit by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: El índice del diseñador de acierto por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> to determine which designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el valor devuelto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> para determinar qué diseñador ha sido alcanzado.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for insertion or deletion operations.
trans-unit.target: Esto es útil para la inserción o eliminación de operaciones.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vacía.

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vacío.

trans-unit.source: Use `Nowhere` to get an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice `Nowhere` para obtener un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> vacío.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto seleccionable asociado al área de acierto.

trans-unit.source: A selectable object associated with the hit area or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no designer is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto seleccionable asociado al área de acierto o una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic) si ningún diseñador está asociado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Use `SelectableObject` to get the selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Utilice `SelectableObject` para obtener el objeto seleccionable asociado al área de acierto.

trans-unit.source: If a designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> will return the activity associated with the designer, or null reference (`Nothing`) if no designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Si un diseñador está asociado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> devolverá la actividad asociada al diseñador o una referencia nula (`Nothing`) si ningún diseñador está asociado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los datos de usuario asociados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A new dictionary for user data, or a reference to the existing user data.
trans-unit.target: Un nuevo diccionario para los datos de usuario o una referencia a los datos de usuario existentes.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> to store user information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> para almacenar información sobre el usuario sobre <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: If no user data has been stored, calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> creates a new, empty dictionary for use.
trans-unit.target: Si no se han almacenado datos de usuario, al llamar a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> se crea un nuevo diccionario vacío para el uso.
